item.title: Jesse Somerville
item.description: Cloud Computing (GCP, AWS) | Kubernetes | IAM | Logging and Monitoring Web App Security | Cloud Security | DevSecOps | Defensive Enablement Python | Golang Experience Praetorian Security, Senior Security Engineer May 2018 - Present Worked alongside clients to help secure their applications and engineer solutions to complex security related problems. Security domains of focus included cloud architecture, microservice architectures, cloud defensive enablement, and DevSecOps. Lead security assessments that involved manual penetration testing and secure code review for cloud architectures, Kubernetes clusters, web applications, IoT devices, and desktop applications.
